name: Last Minute Christmas Shopping
description:
This was an old game I made for a project in High school with my buddies Gabriel and Brian. It's a small game about collecting coins to buy your sister something for Christmas. The more coins you get, the better gift you buy. It lacks some polish, but I'm happy with the result. 

WASD - movement, including jumping

Space - progress through cutscenes

enemy types: 

Rolling head snowman: a rolling head snowman that rolls back and forth.

Shy Snowman: a snowman that tries to sneak up on you when you aren't looking

Button types:

blue buttons need to be pressed once, and then they are held down forever

Red buttons need to be held by you or a snowman

Green buttons are like Redbuttons but they close doors when held.

Thanks for playing!
